summary: This is an internal email from November 12, 2020, discussing media attention around an FBI briefing on the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. It references a New York Post article and coordination between the FBI's New York office, the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG), and the FBI's National Press Office regarding public statements.

events.title: NY Post Article on FBI Epstein Briefing
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article stating the FBI is hosting a briefing regarding the current Jeffrey Epstein investigation and sharing findings with victims.

keyFacts: An internal email from November 12, 2020, discusses media coverage of the FBI's Epstein investigation.
The email references a New York Post article claiming the FBI is hosting a briefing and sharing probe findings with victims.
The FBI's New York office inquired if the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) plans to issue a public statement soon.
A press statement was reportedly already written, but there was uncertainty about whether a clarification was needed.
The FBI's National Press Office and a New York Public Affairs Specialist were copied on the correspondence.
